y respect this bot.

He quickly transformed to bot mode and snapped to atte=
ntion. He was still weak and it took almost everything he had to assume the=
 position. "My names Bullet sir. Function doorkicker sir." The bull knew th=
at if he was in trouble now would be when he found out. His anger subsided =
and there only remained attention for this one bot.

round/SharpClaws/Perceptor::

ffice. they come in and

warrior.

he door closed;
